parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the consumer group for which you want to configure read permissions.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which the consumer group you want to configure belongs.

parameters.name: ReadEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to authorize the consumer group to read messages. Valid values:

*   **true**: The consumer group can read messages.
*   **false**: The consumer group cannot read messages.

Default value: **true**.
